title: book_Providence_of_a_Sparrow
text:
ISBN-13: 9781400033850.
ISBN-10: 1400033853.
Title: Providence of a Sparrow.
Subtitle: Lessons from a Life Gone to the Birds.
Authors: Chris Chester.
Categories: Biography & Autobiography.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=Z7RDDwAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Describes the influence of a foundling baby sparrow that he rescued on the author's life, his relationship with the bird, his transformation of their home into an indoor aviary, and what his birds have taught him about life, joy, the wonder of all living beings, and the natural world. Reprint. 20,000 first printing..
Published Year: 2004.
Average Rating: 4.32.
Number of Pages: 304.
Ratings Count: 218.
